Joshua Aloiye Okogie (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba basket bọọlụ na Phoenix Suns nke National Basketball Association (NBA)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Georgia Tech, a họpụtakwara ya nke iri abụọ n'ozuzu na NBA Draft nke afọ 2018 site na Minnesota Timberwolves
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị otu mba Naịjirịa.
Okogie na ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Ezinụlọ ahụ biri na Snellville, Georgia, ebe Okogie malitere ịgba basketball bu na ụlọ akwụkwọ Shiloh.

Dị ka onye na-agba égbè 6'4 , ESPN edeghị ya na klas recruiting nke afọ 2016. Ọ bịanyere aka na Georgia Tech ma dị ka onye ọhụrụ, Okogie nwetara akara 16.1 5.4 rebounds kwa egwuregwu ma kpọọ aha ya na ACC All-Freshman Team. Ọ bụ onye otu nke atọ na 201718 All-ACC selection dị ka onye nọ na klas nke abụọ. Dị ka onye sophomore, Okogie duuru Georgia Tech iji nweta akara 18.2 kwa egwuregwu
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, o kwupụtara maka 2018 NBA Draft mana ọ wereghị onye nnọchi anya, yabụ na-ahapụ ohere ịlaghachi ụlọ akwụkwọ.. Otú ọ dị, o gosipụtara ebumnuche ya ịbanye na NBA Draft na Mee 21.
Na June 21, 2018, Minnesota Timberwolves were Okogie na n'ozuzu iri abuo na 2018 NBA draft. Na Julaị 2, 2018, ọ bịnyere aka na Timberwolves. O sonyere na 2018 NBA Summer League
Mgbe a zụrụ Jimmy Butler site na Minnesota na mbido Nọvemba, Okogie banyere na mbido mmalite, na-eme ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nkeji iri abụọ na abụọ n'egwuregwu n'oge ahụ
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, o sonyere na NBA Summer League nke afọ 2019
Na Jenụwarị 29, 2019, a kpọrọ ya onye otu World Team maka 2019 Rising Stars Challenge.
Na Julaị 2, 2022, Okogie bịanyere aka na Phoenix Suns. N'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Disemba, Okogie nwetara akara Iri abụọ na asatọ kachasị elu n'ime mmeri 125-90 n'aka ndi Boston Celtics.
Okogie na-agba na otu egwuregwu basketball nke mba Naijiria ma sonye na 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup.
